flavor.check: A symphony of ethereal notes fills the air as The Great Septimus makes its presence known. The harmony beckons you to face your destiny.
encounter: The Harmonious Choir's song swells as The Great Septimus steps forth from the void, its divine presence overwhelming the battlefield.
neutral: The Great Septimus stands motionless, its eyes glowing with the power of an ancient melody. The song reverberates through your very soul.
A wave of divine sound echoes as The Great Septimus raises its hands, signaling the beginning of the trial.
The celestial symphony swirls around you, and The Great Septimus is its unyielding conductor.
You can feel the rhythm of the universe itself. The Great Septimus commands the flow of time with every note played.
Every step The Great Septimus takes is perfectly in tune with the song of the cosmos.
The Great Septimus' presence radiates an overwhelming force, the music of the heavens swirling in the air.
The melody of fate is unavoidableâ€”do you have the strength to endure?
lowHP: The celestial song falters as the Great Septimus' power begins to wane, but its will remains unbroken.
The harmony of the Great Septimus is weakening, but the final note has not yet been sung.
The music fades into silence as The Great Septimus is pushed to its limits.
run: The Great Septimus' celestial presence begins to fade, its song falling silent as it retreats into the ether.
satisfied: The Great Septimus acknowledges your strength, its melody calming as it returns to the heavens, leaving a lingering sense of accomplishment.

neutral: I am the harmony that binds the cosmos.
The song of fate is eternal. You cannot escape it.
The melody of the universe guides my every action.
Can you hear the music? It sings of your destiny.
A single note can change the course of everything.
You are but a fleeting echo in this divine symphony.
The rhythm of the stars cannot be defied.
satisfied: Your strength resonates with the harmony of the cosmos. You have earned my respect.
You have proven yourself worthy of the song of the heavens.
lowHP: Do not mistake this moment for weakness. The music still plays.
The song may fade, but I will rise again.
My power is everlastingâ€”this is not the end.

Gaze.flavor: You instructed the leader to meet the Great Septimus' gaze, its divine eyes glowing with the power of eternal music.

Resonance.flavor: You asked {name} to resonate with the divine melody, disrupting the Great Septimusâ€™ control over the harmony.
response: You think you can match the song of eternity?
This is not a battle you can win with mere noise.
The symphony is beyond your reach.

Crescendo.flavor: You commanded {name} to unleash a crescendo of energy, forcing the Great Septimus into a final confrontation of power and will.
response: The crescendo is nothing compared to the divine song I lead.
You cannot overpower the music of the universe.
This is just a fleeting moment in an eternal symphony.

Dissonance.flavor: You told {pet} to disrupt the harmony with a sudden dissonance, attempting to fracture the Great Septimus' control over the celestial song.
response: Dissonance cannot challenge the divine symphony.
Your noise is but a shadow of the true song.
The song will always find its way back to harmony.

flavor.check: A Meow is a type of dinosaur that roams the plains. Careful, it might pounce!
encounter: Meow has appeared with a mighty roar!
neutral: Meow seems uninterested in your presence.
The dinosaur is eyeing you cautiously.
Meow is basking in the sun, ignoring your approach.
The ground trembles slightly as Meow shifts its weight.
lowHP: Meow's movements are slowing down.
It looks like Meow is getting tired.
The dinosaur seems to be struggling.
run: Meow has decided to retreat back into the wilderness.
satisfied: Meow has acknowledged your strength and returns to its habitat peacefully.

neutral: Rrraaawwrrr!
Meow.. meow..
I am the ruler of this land!
Roaaar!
What are you looking at, puny animals?
I smell fear in the air...
Don't make sudden moves around me!
satisfied: You're not so bad after all.
lowHP: I'm not done yet!
You'll regret this...
This won't be the last you see of me!

Pet.flavor: You told {name} to pet Meow gently.
petLine: There, there, you're a good dino.
response: Meow seems to enjoy the petting.
Purrrr...

Feed.flavor: You offered some food to Meow.
response: Meow devours the food happily.
Yum!
Meow chases after the stick excitedly.
Wheee!

Cuddle.flavor: You gave Meow a warm cuddle.
response: Meow purrs contentedly.
This is nice...

petLine: Here, take this. It's a little bit of warmth. ^^

Cheerbark.flavor: You told your dog {name} to bark a little bit to cheer him up.
petLine: Arf Arf! Do you like it?

flavor.check: Stardust ğ• is a mystical dragon with a deceptive aura. Are you sure you're seeing its real stats?
encounter: Stardust ğ• descends from the cosmos with a shadowy presence!
neutral: Stardust ğ• seems to be plotting something quietly.
ğ• marks the spot where destruction begins.
The air around Stardust ğ• feels heavy with tension.
What could a dragon like this be hiding?
Stardust ğ• silently observes, waiting for the right moment.
Dragons are symbols of power... but what does this one represent?
Is Stardust ğ• even from this world? It feels like it doesn't belong here.
lowHP: Stardust ğ•'s cosmic energy is flickering.
The dragon's celestial glow is dimming.
This creature was never meant to be defeated easily.
run: Stardust ğ• vanishes into thin air, leaving only a trail of stardust.
satisfied: Stardust ğ• seems to acknowledge your strength and retreats into the cosmos peacefully.

neutral: You can't comprehend the power of the stars.
My claws tear through the fabric of reality.
I'm no mere beast, I'm a force of nature.
Don't think you can escape my shadow.
I am Stardust, born from the collision of worlds.
Your fate is written in the stars... and it's grim.
Can you survive a cosmic storm?
The void calls, and I will answer.
Do you hear the hum of the universe? It's my battle cry.
lowHP: I am far from finished...
You may weaken me, but I rise like the stars.
My energy wanes, but my spirit is eternal.
A dragon never falls easily.

Intimidate.flavor: You told {name} to try to intimidate Stardust ğ•.
response: You think you can intimidate a dragon?
Hah, mere mortals.
Your threats are as meaningless as dust.

Compliment.flavor: You told {name} to compliment Stardust ğ• on its magnificent scales.
petLine: Your scales are shining like the stars! You look amazing!
You're one of the most majestic dragons I've ever seen!
response: Flattery won't save you, but I appreciate the gesture.
Hmph, such words are beneath me.
Keep talking, mortal, it amuses me.

StardustOffer.flavor: You told your dragon {name} to offer Stardust ğ• some cosmic energy.
petLine: Here, take some of my energy. It will help you shine even brighter.
response: Cosmic energy, huh? Intriguing...
I'll take it, but don't think this makes us allies.
Your energy is nothing compared to mine.

Song.flavor: You told your pet {name} to sing a soothing melody to calm Stardust ğ•.
petLine: Let my song ease your restless soul.
response: That melody... it's calming.
A lullaby for the end of days?
Hmm...

flavor.check: A titan that controls time itself. Are you really prepared to face such a beast?
encounter: The Titan of Time ğ•‹ğ•€ emerges from the temporal rift!
neutral: The Titan stands still, as if contemplating the very fabric of existence.
ğ•‹ğ•€ stands for TIME!
The Titan of Time ğ•‹ğ•€ is observing the flow of time around you.
Do you think you can manipulate time better than the Titan?
Time flies, and so does the Titan of Time ğ•‹ğ•€.
Tick-tock, says the Titan, your time is running out.
Without time, nothing would change. Without change, there's no progress.
lowHP: The Titan is losing its grip on time.
Titan of Time ğ•‹ğ•€ has low HP.
Time's up for the Titan's lies about its stats.
run: The Titan of Time ğ•‹ğ•€ vanishes into the rift, escaping your grasp.
satisfied: The Titan of Time ğ•‹ğ•€ acknowledges your strength and returns to its temporal domain.

neutral: Time waits for no one.
I control the very essence of existence.
Tick-tock, your end is nigh.
You think you can beat time?
I am the beginning and the end.
All things must pass.
Tick-tock, tick-tock...
Time is a flat circle.
I see all your possible futures.
lowHP: I am not yet defeated.
Time will heal me.
You cannot escape time.
I will rise again.

Freeze.flavor: You told the leader to freeze the Titan of Time ğ•‹ğ•€ momentarily.

Rewind.flavor: You asked {name} to rewind time to confuse the Titan.
response: You think you can outdo me?
Foolish attempt.
Time is on my side.

Accelerate.flavor: You told your pet {name} to accelerate time around the Titan.
response: I control time, not you.
Pathetic.
Time bends to my will.

Pause.flavor: You told your {pet} to pause time around the Titan to slow it down.
response: You cannot stop time.
Nice try.
Time flows endlessly.
